#labels Support
*Software Recommendations*

= Introduction =
A lot of software out there will enable you to work with this project, so what you use will be largely up to you. You will need something that can import/export to .wav, and some way to browse & edit the SVN Repository which is where the files are stored and tracked.


= Music Software =
There are a lot of options for Music software, here's some to get you started:

== Composing ==
  * EnergyXT  ($53 USD, very awesome DAW/Sequencer for Windows/Linux/Mac)
  * Ardour (Free open source DAW for Linux)
  * Rosegarden (Free open source MIDI & Audio sequencing & composition for Linux.)

== Plugins ==
  * Search KVR Audio Plugin Database

== SVN Clients == 
  * TortoiseSVN (Subversion shell extension for Windows)
  * RapidSVN (GUI Subversion client for Linux)
